RelatedSentence: The District 's bid to win more spending freedom from Congress through a ballot referendum is not legally permissible , a federal judge ruled Monday , dealing a setback to officials who argued that voters had the power to amend the city 's charter and change its relationship with overseers on Capitol Hill .

The District 's bid to win more spending freedom from Congress through a ballot referendum is not legally permissible , a federal judge ruled Monday , dealing a setback to officials who argued that voters had the power to amend the city 's charter and change its relationship with overseers on Capitol Hill .

Eugene Volokh teaches free speech law , religious freedom law , church - state relations law , a First Amendment Amicus Brief Clinic , and tort law , at UCLA School of Law , where he has also often taught copyright law , criminal law , and a seminar on firearms regulation policy .
